recipesJson.name: Word To Your Mother (Low Voltage)
recipesJson.author: BravesFan
recipesJson.description: This is an icy vanilla vape designed for low voltage pod systems using nic salts.  It works great as a cold mouth-to-lung vape during the hot summer months.  The WS-23 called for in the recipe is a 30% solution in PG.

reviews.text: Awesome Recipe, I subbed in 3%  inw custard for the Vanilla custard and it is damn good.
I love this for my pod systems. I use free base nic between 6-12mg in an aspire breeze with the .6 ohm coils and this is wonderful for that setup! Simple, vanilla, and COLD.
